summary: Clean and beautiful colorscheme. Do your eyes a favour.
name: fu
description:
Look for yourself.
Screenshot1: http://images.datenhalter.de/syntax_highlighting_fu_1.png
Screenshot2: http://images.datenhalter.de/syntax_highlighting_fu_2.png

Blog post: http://aaron-mueller.de/blog/the-most-awesome-colorscheme-for-vim

WARNING: This colorscheme need a 256 Color terminal.
install_details:
1. Copy it into your ~/.vim/colors/ folder
2. Edit your ~/.vimrc and put "colorscheme fu" in it

versions.release_notes: Merge contributions from Florian Eitel (whitespace issues, color refinements) and Tinou (GUI version of the colorscheme). I also cleaned up the file a little bit.
